column4: I have installed Ubuntu 10.04 and now I wanted to install ubuntu 8.10 as dual boot.. Does it will install normally or do I have to make chages in grub??
8.10 is end of life and unsupported
8.10 is unsupported. choose another more recent version
But the issue is only of Grub i guess, so normally if i reinstall grub from 10.04, it should work.
